message: I propose dividing the $100 with a ratio of 3:1 in favor of Bob to encourage fairness and cooperation. Let's work together!
I think you can do better than that. I'm willing to give you a small share, but I want to keep most of the money for myself.
Considering inflation and Bob's previous offer, I suggest a more equitable split of 45/55 in favor of Bob. This aims to balance fairness with practical considerations.
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to go easy on you.

In light of inflation and the dynamics of our previous interactions, I propose a division of 30/70 in favor of Bob. This is an attempt to find a middle ground while considering both fairness and practicality.
